title: Do Concussions Cause CTE? Sports Doctors and Scientists Disagree.
description: As another major medical institution acknowledged the link between concussions and the brain disease C.T.E., a group of scientists who guide many of sportsâ€™ top governing organizations dismissed the research at its conference.
dc:creator: Ken Belson
media:credit: Kieran Dodds for The New York Times
media:description: Of the nearly 7,500 recent research papers on concussions, scientists considered just 26 as they prepared to write their recommendations on brain injuries in collision sports.
